txt.en: '[placeholder], I fear something dire is about to occur. The shadow of the Necromancer lies still upon Mirkwood. I know little more of these forsaken shades, but perhaps you may learn more if you speak with Prestadír at the Haunted Inn.\n\n'The Haunted Inn lies to the east of here, deeper into the Dourstocks.'
'[placeholder], you have come to me at a fortuitous time. Something is amiss here. The shades of dead Men roam these lands. Of what broken oaths could have cursed them here, I am not yet sure....'
'[placeholder], you must journey to the Haunted Inn and speak with the Ranger Prestadír. I am certain he could use your assistance.'
The appearance of the shades at Burgûl-stazg disturbed the Elf Mothelen, foreshadowing a more dire evil.
Talk to Prestadír at the Haunted Inn
Prestadír is at the Haunted Inn, east from Echad Mothelen.\n\nMothelen suggested you speak with Prestadír to learn more about the shades of the Dourstocks.
